00016         template <typename CTy>
00017         /* explicit */ GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER
00018         format_punct<CTy>::format_punct(size_t a)
00019                 : std::locale::facet(a),
00020                 formatted         (true),
00021                 precision         (3),
00022                 width             (1 + 4 + 1 + precision),
00023                 separator         (','),
00024                 delim_left        ('['),
00025                 delim_right       (']'),
00026                 space             (' '),
00027                 newline           ('\n'),
00028                 order             (row_major)
00029         {}
00030 
00031         template <typename CTy>
00032         /* explicit */ GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER
00033         format_punct<CTy>::format_punct(format_punct const& a)
00034                 : std::locale::facet(0),
00035                 formatted         (a.formatted),
00036                 precision         (a.precision),
00037                 width             (a.width),
00038                 separator         (a.separator),
00039                 delim_left        (a.delim_left),
00040                 delim_right       (a.delim_right),
00041                 space             (a.space),
00042                 newline           (a.newline),
00043                 order             (a.order)
00044         {}
00045

00048         template <typename CTy, typename CTr>
00049         /* explicit */ GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER basic_state_saver<CTy,CTr>::basic_state_saver(std::basic_ios<CTy,CTr>& a)
00050                 : state_    (a),
00051                 flags_    (a.flags()),
00052                 precision_(a.precision()),
00053                 width_    (a.width()),
00054                 fill_     (a.fill()),
00055                 locale_   (a.getloc())
00056         {}
00057 
00058         template <typename CTy, typename CTr>
00059         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER basic_state_saver<CTy,CTr>::~basic_state_saver()
00060         {
00061                 state_.imbue(locale_);
00062                 state_.fill(fill_);
00063                 state_.width(width_);
00064                 state_.precision(precision_);
00065                 state_.flags(flags_);
00066         }

00068         template <typename CTy, typename CTr>
00069         /* explicit */ GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER basic_format_saver<CTy,CTr>::basic_format_saver(std::basic_ios<CTy,CTr>& a)
00070                 : bss_(a)
00071         {
00072                 a.imbue(std::locale(a.getloc(), new format_punct<CTy>(get_facet<format_punct<CTy> >(a))));
00073         }

00088         template <typename CTy>
00089         /* explicit */ GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER delimeter<CTy>::delimeter(CTy a, CTy b, CTy c)
00090                 : value()
00091         {
00092                 value[0] = a;
00093                 value[1] = b;
00094                 value[2] = c;
00095         }

00102         template <typename FTy, typename CTy, typename CTr>
00103         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER FTy const& get_facet(std::basic_ios<CTy,CTr>& ios)
00104         {
00105                 if (!std::has_facet<FTy>(ios.getloc())) {
00106                 ios.imbue(std::locale(ios.getloc(), new FTy));
00107                 }
00108 
00109                 return std::use_facet<FTy>(ios.getloc());
00110         }

00112         template <typename CTy, typename CTr>
00113         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER std::basic_ios<CTy,CTr>& formatted(std::basic_ios<CTy,CTr>& ios)
00114         {
00115                 const_cast<format_punct<CTy>&>(get_facet<format_punct<CTy> >(ios)).formatted = true;
00116 
00117                 return ios;
00118         }

00122         {
00123                 const_cast<format_punct<CTy>&>(get_facet<format_punct<CTy> >(ios)).formatted = false;

00144         template <typename CTy, typename CTr>
00145         std::basic_ostream<CTy, CTr>& operator<<(std::basic_ostream<CTy, CTr>& os, delimeter<CTy> const& a)
00146         {
00147                 format_punct<CTy> & fmt(const_cast<format_punct<CTy>&>(get_facet<format_punct<CTy> >(os)));
00148 
00149                 fmt.delim_left  = a.value[0];
00150                 fmt.delim_right = a.value[1];
00151                 fmt.separator   = a.value[2];
00152 
00153                 return os;
00154         }

00167         template <typename CTy, typename CTr, typename T, precision P>
00168         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER std::basic_ostream<CTy,CTr>& operator<<(std::basic_ostream<CTy,CTr>& os, tquat<T,P> const& a)
00169         {
00170                 typename std::basic_ostream<CTy,CTr>::sentry const cerberus(os);
00171 
00172                 if(cerberus)
00173                 {
00174                         io::format_punct<CTy> const & fmt(io::get_facet<io::format_punct<CTy> >(os));
00175 
00176                         if(fmt.formatted)
00177                         {
00178                                 io::basic_state_saver<CTy> const bss(os);
00179 
00180                                 os << std::fixed
00181                                         << std::right
00182                                         << std::setprecision(fmt.precision)
00183                                         << std::setfill(fmt.space)
00184                                         << fmt.delim_left
00185                                         << std::setw(fmt.width) << a.w << fmt.separator
00186                                         << std::setw(fmt.width) << a.x << fmt.separator
00187                                         << std::setw(fmt.width) << a.y << fmt.separator
00188                                         << std::setw(fmt.width) << a.z
00189                                         << fmt.delim_right;
00190                         }
00191                         else
00192                         {
00193                                 os << a.w << fmt.space << a.x << fmt.space << a.y << fmt.space << a.z;
00194                         }
00195                 }
00196 
00197                 return os;
00198         }

00296         template <typename CTy, typename CTr, typename T, precision P>
00297         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER std::basic_ostream<CTy,CTr>& operator<<(std::basic_ostream<CTy,CTr>& os, tmat2x2<T,P> const& a)
00298         {
00299                 typename std::basic_ostream<CTy,CTr>::sentry const cerberus(os);
00300 
00301                 if(cerberus)
00302                 {
00303                         io::format_punct<CTy> const & fmt(io::get_facet<io::format_punct<CTy> >(os));
00304                         tmat2x2<T,P> m(a);
00305 
00306                         if(io::row_major == fmt.order)
00307                                 m = transpose(a);
00308 
00309                         if(fmt.formatted)
00310                         {
00311                                 os << fmt.newline
00312                                         << fmt.delim_left << m[0] << fmt.newline
00313                                         << fmt.space      << m[1] << fmt.delim_right;
00314                         }
00315                         else
00316                         {
00317                                 os << m[0] << fmt.space << m[1];
00318                         }
00319                 }
00320 
00321                 return os;
00322         }

00558         template <typename CTy, typename CTr, typename T, precision P>
00559         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER std::basic_ostream<CTy,CTr>& operator<<(
00560                 std::basic_ostream<CTy,CTr> & os,
00561                 std::pair<tmat4x4<T,P> const, tmat4x4<T,P> const> const& a)
00562         {
00563                 typename std::basic_ostream<CTy,CTr>::sentry const cerberus(os);
00564 
00565                 if(cerberus)
00566                 {
00567                         io::format_punct<CTy> const & fmt(io::get_facet<io::format_punct<CTy> >(os));
00568                         tmat4x4<T,P> ml(a.first);
00569                         tmat4x4<T,P> mr(a.second);
00570 
00571                         if(io::row_major == fmt.order)
00572                         {
00573                                 ml = transpose(a.first);
00574                                 mr = transpose(a.second);
00575                         }
00576 
00577                         if(fmt.formatted)
00578                         {
00579                                 CTy const & l(fmt.delim_left);
00580                                 CTy const & r(fmt.delim_right);
00581                                 CTy const & s(fmt.space);
00582 
00583                                 os << fmt.newline
00584                                         << l << ml[0] << s << s << l << mr[0] << fmt.newline
00585                                         << s << ml[1] << s << s << s << mr[1] << fmt.newline
00586                                         << s << ml[2] << s << s << s << mr[2] << fmt.newline
00587                                         << s << ml[3] << r << s << s << mr[3] << r;
00588                         }
00589                         else
00590                         {
00591                                 os << ml << fmt.space << mr;
00592                         }
00593                 }
00594 
00595                 return os;
00596         }
00597 }//namespace detail
00598 }//namespace glm
